ygData.subject: Re: Question about Kelin's Lugubrious Lement
ygData.msgSnippet: You need to lull one and attack the other.  It is reputed to be harder to lull many and be ready for all of them if it fails.  For a multiple mob spawn (4 or 5
ygData.messageBody:
You need to lull one and attack the other. It is reputed to be harder to
lull many and be ready for all of them if it fails. For a multiple mob
spawn (4 or 5 up at one time) you'd have to lull all except the one you want
to attack. Then drag it out and kill it. Rinse, repeat.

Sylly.

-----Original Message-----
From: CyberGhozt _ [mailto:cyberghozt@...]
Sent: Wednesday, June 09, 1999 2:45 PM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: [eqbards] Question about Kelin's Lugubrious
Lement

From: CyberGhozt _ <cyberghozt@...>

I know that this song has been talked about a whole
lot...but sadly i missed
all of it. All I want to know is how you can take out a
whole camp using it?
I tried this but it did not seem to work. I fought the orcs
in east
commonlands in their camps for quite a while. If i used the
song on one and
then attacked it, when it left camp, the rest of the orcs
followed. Can
somebody just explain all the uses of it?
Thanks...
